item.title: About Lorenz
item.description: Hi, I’m Lorenz. Here are some facts about me that might be of interest to you: Profession: Software Engineer Degrees: MSc (Dipl.Ing. for my fellow Austrians) BSc In Software Engineering & Management and Software Development & Business Management, respectively, from Graz University of Technology Interests: Python, C++, many other programming languages, Linux, vim, free and open-source software Portfolio: lolei.github.io/portfolio How to reach me: See the front page for either my email address or my socials
